roleset.name: atone for
roleset.note: EXPIATE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. I think my John might be a little more wicked than Paul's... (from expiate.01-v)

example.name: basic
example.text: First, Christ, by this circumstance of his passion, was to expiate our sins of several kinds.
example.arg: by this circumstance of his passion,
